alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Mecklenburg, Lunenburg and Brunswick Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Victoria to near South Hill to 8 miles northwest of Norlina. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brodnax and La Crosse around 520 PM EDT. Lawrenceville and Dundas around 545 PM EDT. Ebony around 550 PM EDT. Brunswick, Alberta and Gasburg around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bacons Fork, Cochran, Wilburn, Gills Corner, Beechwood, Arvins Store, Dolphin, Bowens Corner, Meredithville and Forksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
